content: The blouse is a lightweight, pastel pink color with a subtle floral print. It has a flowy, relaxed fit with a V-neckline and cap sleeves. I'd say my personal style is a mix of classic and trendy - I like to incorporate statement pieces into my outfits, but I also like to keep things simple and effortless. As for my plans, I was thinking of meeting a friend for brunch and then maybe taking a walk in the park later.
